subject: On behalf of the constitutiona
body:
On behalf of the constitutional judiciary of Uganda Republic, l am Excellency Yoweri Museveni president of Uganda Republic and Chief of Army National forces write to say that this stands as an authentic guarantee that after you make the Shipping, Delivery Process, and customs clearance fees which will cost US$280.00 only, you will start using your ATM card to withdraw your funds worth US$200,000,000.00 (Two Hundred Million United States Dollars) from any ATM Machine around the world without having a problem with any authorities in your country as my country is the Fund Origin of this genus fund merited by you as a compensation payment fund.l need to remind you that you can withdraw only US$150,000.00 per day until the total amount of US$200,000,000.00 (Two Hundred Million United States Dollars) is completed.
 That l have the legal right to sue any parties if (bank) fails to act as stated in this sealed guarantee) we shall be liable to take all action and also make a refund to you and there shall be no further requirement of charges attached to the issuing of these approval funds, This is our statement of guarantee and you are mandated to comply with a specific period or the above fund shall be called back into the Federal treasury.
 This serves as an agreement/contract between the president of Uganda Republic and the party involved that if there is any breach of contract, the other party/bank shall have legal proceedings either in the law court or any other means of reclaiming his right whatsoever.
You have to contact my Vice for payment at (Vice President Jessica Alupo) Email:  
authorityngo34@gmail.com
.
Official Message from
Excellency Yoweri Museveni.
E-mail: 
emailofficail313@gmail.com
.

subject: Re: On behalf of the constitutiona
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this sounds like an incredible opportunity! I can't believe that I've been selected for such a generous offer. It's not every day that one gets a message from the President of Uganda Republic himself!

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned something about shipping, delivery process, and customs clearance fees. Could you please elaborate on what these fees are for? And why is it necessary to pay them before I can start using the ATM card?

Also, could you tell me more about how this fund was merited to me? I'm just curious about how my name came up in this selection process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
